title: Telescoping Snow Shovel in Red
description: Be prepared for any winter travel emergency with the Telescoping Snow Shovel in Red by Stalwart. Our collapsible, lightweight aluminum shovel is the ideal snow shovel for your car, truck, RV or snowmobile. It makes a great addition to your roadside emergency kit to dig snow, sand and small gravel from around your tires if your vehicle becomes stuck. The ergonomic, T-shaped handle is easy to grip and collapses to a minimum length of 21 in., making it the perfect size to store in your trunk or under a seat. The handle has a maximum length of 32 in. for more leverage while shoveling. The shovel has 3-pieces that assemble in minutes and break down to easily store in a backpack or on the back of a snowmobile or ATV.
